plot: This short takes a look at South African township life, in the late 1970's, through the eyes of Esther Mtini.
title: Esther Mtini
plot_es: This short takes a look at South African township life, in the late 1970's, through the eyes of Esther Mtini.
plot_en: This short takes a look at South African township life, in the late 1970's, through the eyes of Esther Mtini.
